name: SalusSoloSkill
0:
”Alexa, what is bed room temperature”
”Alexa, set living room to 75”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Salus Solo Skill for Salus WiFi Thermostat

This skill helps in discovering the salus thermostats and controlling their setpoints and thermostat mode.
User will need to use Alexa App(US) and login with their registered salus account to discover their salus thermostat devices and once discover is successfull will be able to control their setpoints and mode via Alexa App.
